user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.<COMPLETION_START>Being overweight is unhealthy and can lead to various health problems.
Smoking causes cancer and other health problems.
Alcohol consumption can lead to liver damage and addiction.
Fossil fuels are a major contributor to climate change.
The world population is increasing at an unsustainable rate.
Most species of animals are currently at risk of extinction.
Most people do not get enough exercise.
A high-sugar diet can lead to obesity and diabetes.
The majority of car accidents are caused by human error.
The death penalty does not effectively deter crime.
The majority of people who commit crimes will reoffend.
The US spends more on healthcare than any other country, but does not have the best health outcomes.
Education does not guarantee success or happiness.
Most people will not achieve their dreams or reach their full potential.
Many jobs will be automated in the near future, leading to widespread job loss.
The average lifespan in the US is decreasing due to factors such as obesity and drug overdose.<COMPLETION_END>
